metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9275 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
ARC 5.21q allows directory traversal via a full pathname in an archivefile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

arc - 5.21q-6
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: arc package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.21q-6').
